name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications focused on responsive design and web architecture. Expert in **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, with a strong command of **Angular** and **NgRx** for modern web applications. Proficient in building and optimizing **RESTful APIs** and employing **Git** for version control, alongside seamless integration of **CI/CD** practices to enhance deployment efficiency.

Deeply experienced in deploying cloud-native systems, utilizing **AWS** and **Azure** services, complemented by backend capabilities in **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record of developing AI/ML-powered platforms to implement predictive analytics and automation, while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Exceptional skills in performance optimization, ensuring applications deliver robust user experiences.
